footer.description: Crafting timeless elegance through exceptional footwear

about.title: About Us
about.description: Welcome to SAKO-OR, where fashion meets comfort. We are dedicated to providing high-quality footwear and accessories that combine style, durability, and comfort.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create exceptional footwear and accessories that enhance our customers' lives through superior quality, innovative design, and sustainable practices.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading brand in the fashion industry, known for our commitment to quality, customer satisfaction, and environmental responsibility.

about.heritageText: Founded with a passion for craftsmanship and an eye for timeless design, SAKO-OR has been creating exceptional footwear since our inception. Our journey began with a simple belief: that every step should be taken in comfort and style.
about.craftsmanshipText: Each pair of SAKO-OR shoes is a testament to our commitment to quality and attention to detail. Our skilled artisans combine time-honored techniques with contemporary design to create footwear that is both beautiful and functional.
about.qualityText: We never compromise on the quality of our materials or craftsmanship.
about.sustainabilityText: We are committed to responsible sourcing and sustainable practices.
about.innovationText: We continuously evolve while staying true to our heritage.
about.teamText: Behind every SAKO-OR creation is a team of passionate individuals dedicated to excellence in design and craftsmanship.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.getInTouchText: Have questions about our products or services? We're here to help. Reach out to us through any of the channels below.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

home.heroDescription: Discover our curated collection of premium footwear, sourced from Europe's finest artisans and China's most prestigious manufacturers.
home.collectionsDescription: Each piece in our collection represents the perfect harmony of design, comfort, and craftsmanship
home.featuredDescription: Discover our most coveted designs, each telling a unique story of luxury and sophistication
home.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to receive exclusive updates, early access to new collections, and personalized style recommendations.

signin.title: Sign Up
signin.subtitle: Create your account to get started
signin.newsletterDescription: Yes, send me updates and offers
signin.passwordRequired: Password must be at least 6 characters
